titleStmt.title: Vignola, or, The compleat architect shewing in a plain and easie way the rules of the five orders of architecture, viz. Tuscan, Dorick, Ionick, Corinthian, and Composite : whereby any that can but read and understand English may readily learn the proportious [sic] that all members in a building have one unto another / set forth by Mr. James Barozzio of Vignola ; translated into English by Joseph Moxon.
Regola delli cinque ordini d'architettura. English
titleStmt.author: Vignola, 1507-1573.

titleStmt.title: Vignola, or, The compleat architect shewing in a plain and easie way the rules of the five orders of architecture, viz. Regola delli cinque ordini d'architettura. English
titleStmt.author: Vignola, 1507-1573.
Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Joseph Moxon, and sold at his shop ...,
